attributes.action: call for the resignation of Nick Jarman who is the head of child services for doncaster/edlington council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we ask the Prime minister to call for the resignation of the above for his incompetent running of doncaster child protection service which allowed a 10 and 11 yr old to attack and torture two other children whilst they were known to the social services department under his jurisdiction. we also call for the immediate removal of all social workers concerned in this blunder of neolithic proportions.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
